sqlMap.select: SELECT /* PAYA0100.SEARCH00.급여수당정보_직원구분 조회 */ DISTINCT A.STDS_YMTH AS STDS_YMTH /* 기준년월 */ , A.WAGP_CODE /* 급여그룹코드 */ , A.CLSD_CODE /* 직원구분코드 */ , SF_GET_COMMNAME('CLSD_CODE', A.CLSD_CODE) AS CLSD_NAME /* 직원구분 */ , B.SORT_ORDR FROM PY_PAYEXP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_CODEXD B ON B.COMM_CODE = 'CLSD_CODE' AND B.COMD_CODE = A.CLSD_CODE WHERE STDS_YMTH = #STDS_YMTH# AND WAGP_CODE = #WAGP_CODE# ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDR

SELECT /* PAYA0100.SEARCH01.급여수당정보_수당수식 조회 */ A.STDS_YMTH /* 기준년월 */ , A.WAGP_CODE /* 급여코드 */ , A.CLSD_CODE /* 직원구분코드 */ , A.EXPD_CODE /* 수당공제코드 */ , B.EXPD_NAME , A.APLY_MODN /* 적용수식코드 */ FROM PY_PAYEXP A LEFT OUTER JOIN PY_ALLDED B ON A.EXPD_CODE = B.EXPD_CODE WHERE A.STDS_YMTH = #STDS_YMTH# AND A.WAGP_CODE = #WAGP_CODE# AND A.EXPD_CODE LIKE 'D%' ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDR

SELECT /* PAYA0100.SEARCH02.급여수당정보_사용수당정보 조회 */ MAX(CASE WHEN MOD(ROW_NUMB,2) = 1 THEN EXPD_NAME END) AS EXPD_NAME1 , MAX(CASE WHEN MOD(ROW_NUMB,2) = 0 THEN EXPD_NAME END) AS EXPD_NAME2 , TRUNC((ROW_NUMB-1)/2,0) AS ROWCNT FROM ( SELECT (SELECT EXPD_NAME FROM PY_ALLDED WHERE EXPD_CODE = A.EXPD_CODE) AS EXPD_NAME , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDR) AS ROW_NUMB FROM PY_PAYEXP A LEFT OUTER JOIN PY_ALLDED B ON A.EXPD_CODE = B.EXPD_CODE WHERE A.STDS_YMTH = #STDS_YMTH# AND A.WAGP_CODE = #WAGP_CODE# AND A.CLSD_CODE = #CLSD_CODE# AND A.EXPD_CODE LIKE 'A%' ) Z GROUP BY TRUNC((ROW_NUMB-1)/2,0) ORDER BY ROWCNT

SELECT /* PAYA0100.SEARCH03.정의함수 조회 */ MAX(CASE WHEN MOD(ROWN,2) = 1 THEN FUNC_NAME END) AS FUNC_NAME1 , MAX(CASE WHEN MOD(ROWN,2) = 0 THEN FUNC_NAME END) AS FUNC_NAME2 , TRUNC((ROWN-1)/2,0) ROWCNT FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(PROCEDURE_NAME,4) AS FUNC_NAME , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PROCEDURE_NAME) AS ROWN FROM ALL_PROCEDURES WHERE OBJECT_NAME = 'PKG_PAY_FUNC' AND PROCEDURE_NAME LIKE 'SF%' ) A GROUP BY TRUNC((ROWN-1)/2,0) ORDER BY ROWCNT

SELECT /* PAYA0100.SEARCH04.급여공제정보_사용공제정보 테이블 조회 */ MAX(CASE WHEN MOD(ROW_NUMB , 2) = 1 THEN EXPD_NAME END) AS EXPD_NAME1 , MAX(CASE WHEN MOD(ROW_NUMB , 2) = 0 THEN EXPD_NAME END) AS EXPD_NAME2 , TRUNC((ROW_NUMB-1)/2,0) AS ROWCNT FROM ( SELECT (SELECT EXPD_NAME FROM PY_ALLDED WHERE EXPD_CODE = A.EXPD_CODE) AS EXPD_NAME , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDR) AS ROW_NUMB FROM PY_PAYEXP A LEFT OUTER JOIN PY_ALLDED B ON A.EXPD_CODE = B.EXPD_CODE WHERE A.STDS_YMTH = #STDS_YMTH# AND A.WAGP_CODE = #WAGP_CODE# AND A.CLSD_CODE = #CLSD_CODE# AND A.EXPD_CODE LIKE 'D%' ) Z GROUP BY TRUNC((ROW_NUMB-1)/2,0) ORDER BY TRUNC((ROW_NUMB-1)/2,0)
